Disrupting disaster relief with a complete 360 degree response. Going above and beyond with real time emergency assistance to individuals and their families. Solving complex problems with innovative solutions and smart partnerships.

Global Relief Network

Large scale logistics solution for humanitarian aid supply and distribution.
Program Info
Featured

Family Necessities Kits

Supplying prepackaged family kits delivered in real-time across our hemisphere to people in need.
Program Info
Featured

Second Phase: Gap Period

Sustainability

Global Relief Network

Welcome to GEM’s global aid network. A worldwide matrix consisting of community drives, corporate donors, private donors, government and international NGOs all working together under a streamlined efficient umbrella operated by GEM BStrong.
Donate
Our Work
Education

Smart Class

GEM Bstrong in partnership with SmartAID, LHI, and MWCF, we have created an education initiative and network to support Ukrainian students in Poland, Romania, Moldova, and beyond. With an influx of hundreds of thousands of new students under refugee status, schools and families are facing multiple difficulties. In response to this, the Smart Class program was created.
Donate
Our Work
Tools

Tool Program

As part of GEM’s phase 2 disaster response, this program assists local contractors and tradesmen with tools, creates jobs, puts people back to work and helps rebuild communities.
Donate
Our Work

Phase Three: Sustainability

Hope For Bucha

GEM in partnership with the Bucha City Council & Quality of Life UA has fully activated is phase 2-3 programs. This program is aimed to bring hope back to many Bucha communities by starting light repairs on homes, apartment buildings, schools and hospitals.
Learn More
New
Education

Laptop Initiative

As part of GEM’s long-term sustainable response, in partnership with India Hicks, we are distributing laptops to students.
Donate
Our Work
Sustainability

Sacred Amazonia

As part of GEM’s long-term sustainable response, in coordination with Sacred Amazonia, we are proud to make available the Sacred Amazonia initiative.
Donate
Our Work
School Rebuilds

School Rebuilds

Our third phase, sustainable development, of disaster response includes the building and rebuilding of schools that were damaged by natural disasters. This helps communities return to normalcy.
Donate
Our Work
Community Rebuilds

Home Rebuilds

Our third phase of disaster response, coordinated with government and public-private partners, includes rebuilding permanent and durable housing while implementing livelihood programs.
Donate
Our Work
Education

Sponsor a Child

As part of GEM’s long-term sustainable response, in coordination with public / private partners, we have a SPONSOR A CHILD initiative. Our goal is to create a self-sufficient and thriving community
Donate
Our Work
Education

Education

Included in our sustainable development phase to disaster response is our education and tuition initiative which ensures children have a safe place to learn and a quality education.
Donate
Our Work
Empowerment

Empowerment & Wellness

GEM supports Empowerment & Wellness Programs by bringing in specialists in these fields to give hope to people after disasters.
Donate
Our Work
Adopt A Fisherman

Adopt a Fisherman

GEM Designed this program to empower the fishing community with the necessary tools to make a living, feed their communities and re-open the seafood export market to the US and abroad.
Donate
Our Work
Water Filtration

Water Filtration

Drinking clean, filtered water protects the body from disease and leads to overall greater health and energy. Water filters reduce the risk of gastrointestinal disease by more than 80 percent.
Donate
Our Work
